project_descr: Enhancing Good Governance in Romania UDF-ROM-07-193

outputs.output_descr: Two of the critical problems faced by Roma and women at all political levels are the need for politically-skilled activists and the need for effective governance by elected Roma and women. After the local elections in 2008, the number of elected women decreased, and the lack of representation in elected bodies for the Roma communities has not improved much. The strategy of the project “Enhancing good governance in Romania”: Improving the Capacity of Elected Women and Minorities to Represent Citizens in Romania is therefore to support the newly elected Roma and women representatives in carrying

project_title: enhancing good governance in romania udf-rom-07-193
